reviewText: Great movie for kids, my only issues were 1st the movement of the characters, the speed of their physical motions could have been faster. I mean these are robots they should be faster, stronger, and smarter. 2nd the action scene could've maybe had more action, maybe more explotions, or a better fight scene to make the movie more exciting.

This isn't as bad as people think
This could very well be a passing school project
All it needs is:
Better animation
Better characters and models
Better and longer/deeper plot
A proper full ending
Better acting
And villain
Only remove the dumb monitor robot
And it could be far better
Love it good movie for the children
Bought for my son. Not the right movie. Its a panda movie instead
Fun movie. My kids really enjoyed it !!!
